titleStmt.title: The Kings entertainment at Yorke as it was related by John Strickland, the 22. of March, 1641. who came out of Yorke, on Saturday last at nine of the clocke.
titleStmt.author: Strickland, John, 1600 or 1601-1670.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Iohn Strikland his Marke X.
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
